blog.name: lerums
blog.title: Marvel’s Irondad
blog.description: I go by Lena | 21 | Lerums on Ao3

summary: As I’m gearing up
body:
As I’m gearing up

For Avengers Endgame, rewatching movies, listening to and reading theories for how this might go down, I have one fear that is above all others. That is the impact we’ve seen up until now being erased.

Like, if Cap goes back in time, sacrificing himself in the 40s, what will be his lasting impact on the MCU going forward? Same with all the others, especially Iron Man and Thor.

Now if we trust Flash Thompson’s line in the FFH trailer it doesn’t seem like they’ll be totally forgotten, but will their roles in this world be shrunk? That could be a good thing in some ways, the world keeping their national hero after saving them from Hitler would change post-WW2-America, one chitauri attack less on NY would be welcomed, but what will that do with our heroes’ role in it all?

I think there’s a chance that this cinematic universe will move on in phase 4 not knowing the impact their heroes had on their past, present and future. Don’t get me wrong, that would be great filmmaking, going deep into the meaning of sacrifice etc., BUT IT WOULD HURT AND I LOVE MY ORIGINAL SIX AND IM SCARED OF THIS NEXT MOVIE OKAY

summary:
“Christ.” Bucky gasped, eyes flying open, wide with shock. “Tony, fuck.”
“By god, it worked,” Tony murmured, “it actually...
body:
I Want To Fly (But I Don’t Have The Wings)

“Christ.” Bucky gasped, eyes flying open, wide with shock. “Tony, fuck.”

“By god, it worked,” Tony murmured, “it actually fucking worked.”

“You gave me my wings back.”

“Fucking right I did.”

.

Read it here on ao3!

Now with a beautiful accompanying moodboard by @starkerchemistryy

summary: Even Lambs Roar - shetlandowl - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: Even Lambs Roar - shetlandowl - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 5/5
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe
Rating: Mature
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Pepper Potts & Tony Stark, Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
Characters: Pepper Potts, Tony Stark, Clint Barton, Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Jimmy Fallon
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Actors, Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics, Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Objectification, Like to the max. I kinda wanna hug poor Steeb, Alpha Steve Rogers, Omega Tony Stark, Pre-Relationship
Summary:

Tony and Clint are part of the creative team that make The Tonight Show an exciting, laugh-out-loud part of late-night entertainment. Usually, the guests that come on the show are fun, engaging, and talkative omegas who know the ins and outs of show business, and aren’t afraid to play along for the audience at home. They need a little more time and a lot more prep when alphas come on the show.

summary:
Tony: *wakes up tied to a chair* Oh, ffs...
Tony: Alright, so which one were you after? Tony Stark or Iron Man?
Villain of the...
body:
Tony: *wakes up tied to a chair* Oh, ffs...
Tony: Alright, so which one were you after? Tony Stark or Iron Man?
Villain of the week: What-?
Tony: When I get out of here, I need to know if I'm blowing up your credit rating or your base.

summary:
WAIT TONY MEMTIONED PROJECT P.E.G.A.S.U.S. (WHERE MAR-VELL WORKED) IN IRON MAN 2
How did HE know about it?? He didn’t even know...
body:
WAIT TONY MEMTIONED PROJECT P.E.G.A.S.U.S. (WHERE MAR-VELL WORKED) IN IRON MAN 2

How did HE know about it?? He didn’t even know about SHIELD

Did Howard do work with Project P.E.G.A.S.U.S. and that’s how Mar-Vell got the Tesseract?

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Iron Man Armored Adventures
title: Iron Man Armored Adventures
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TOwfqS

by Angelssavior

Six months after losing his father and becoming iron man, Stark International billionaire Anthony Edward Stark, better known as tony meets the lonesome and shy Heaven Marie wolf. Their worlds soon collide when they both realize that they have one thing in common, stop Obadiah Stane. And maybe save the world.

Words: 1296, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Iron Man: Armored Adventures, Marvel
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Rape/Non-Con, Underage
  • Characters: Howard Stark, Gene Khan, Pepper Potts, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Roberta Rhodes, O'Brian, Tony Stark, Arthur Parks, Basil Sandhurst, The Controller, Modoc, Aim, magia - Character, Killer Shrike, Unicorn - Character, Living Laser, Ghost, Black Panther, T'Challa (Marvel), Nick Fury, Maria Hill, Rick Jones, Bruce Banner, The Hulk, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Whitney Stane, Obadiah Stane, Justin Hammer, Sasha, Happy Hogan, Doctor yinsen

summary: Iron Man Armored Adventures
title: Iron Man Armored Adventures
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TOwfqS

by Angelssavior

Six months after losing his father and becoming iron man, Stark International billionaire Anthony Edward Stark, better known as tony meets the lonesome and shy Heaven Marie wolf. Their worlds soon collide when they both realize that they have one thing in common, stop Obadiah Stane. And maybe save the world.

summary: Daughters
title: Daughters
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2uk8cko

by bromanticheartmates (justmagnusbane)

Peter and Wade love each other deeply and unapologetically. With equal measure do they both love their daughter/s.

Based on the prompt:
please write another Spideypool fluffy fic, maybe with Deadpool’s daughter in it? I think DP is very much a family man, but a dark one, like Walter White in Breaking Bad, and Spider-Man is a righteous vigilante, somehow the combination could make a sweet domestic story

Words: 7269, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of Spideypool Requests

summary:
You guys... this Ironstrange video needs more love.
Listen, I know you may look at this and be like “Wait, a Sherlock...
body:
You guys… this Ironstrange video needs more love.

Listen, I know you may look at this and be like “Wait, a Sherlock crossover?? That’s uh…”

But no, watch the whole thing because you’ll understand why they used it, and the music? And the editing? This is maybe the prettiest and most romantic Ironstrange video I’ve seen.

It’s also the only video I know that visually shows the popular “Strange falls for Tony during those 14 million time loops” fanfic trope, as well as a new trope I didnt even know I needed. Seeing that with my actual eyeballs is worth it, but I just love the whole thing.

It also manages to contextualualize Strange’s final action with even more tragedy, if you can believe it.

Seriously I can’t even watch it without tearing by the end. Gorgeous.

I’m making this song my ringtone.

You guys… this Ironstrange video needs more love.

Listen, I know you may look at this and be like “Wait, a Sherlock crossover?? That’s uh…”

But no, watch the whole thing because you’ll understand why they used it, and the music? And the editing? This is maybe the prettiest and most romantic Ironstrange video I’ve seen.

It’s also the only video I know that visually shows the popular “Strange falls for Tony during those 14 million time loops” fanfic trope, as well as a new trope I didnt even know I needed. Seeing that with my actual eyeballs is worth it, but I just love the whole thing.

It also manages to contextualualize Strange’s final action with even more tragedy, if you can believe it.

Seriously I can’t even watch it without tearing by the end. Gorgeous.

I’m making this song my ringtone.

blog.title: FanficFaerie's A/B/O Library
blog.description:
Alpha/Beta/Omega- a trope wherein some or all people have defined biological roles based on a hierarchical system.
Wing AU - Characters have wings

summary: Atonement - amandalee727 - The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]
title: Atonement - amandalee727 - The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 9/9
Fandom: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Marvel (Comics), Marvel Cinematic Universe
Rating: Mature
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark, Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Wanda Maximoff/Vision, Pepper Potts/Natasha Romanov, Clint Barton/Laura Barton, the story is focused on Steve/Tony/Bucky, all other pairings are either minor or merely mentioned
Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Wanda Maximoff, Vision (Marvel), Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Peter Parker
Additional Tags: Mentions of past abuse and torture, Mentions of past physical and mental abuse, Mental Instability, bucky has problems, Historical AU, clan au, Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics, Omega Tony, alpha bucky, Alpha Steve, Baby Peter, Mpreg
Series: Part 2 of Legacy
Summary:

After the war that almost tore Tony and Steve’s clan apart, they’re given peaceful times to raise their son.

However, when Bucky, previously thought dead, returns to the clan in a very unexpected way, things may not be as settled as Tony had hoped for.

Somehow, the three must overcome each of their struggles, and possibly find something more along the way.
